    • Constructor Detail

      • SimplePersistableResourceAssembler

        public SimplePersistableResourceAssembler(Class<?> controllerClass,
                                          org.springframework.hateoas.RelProvider relProvider)
        Default a assembler based on Spring MVC controller, resource type, and RelProvider. With this combination of information, resources can be defined.
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - - Spring MVC controller to base links off of
        relProvider -
        See Also:
        to adjust base path to something like "/api"/

      • getCollectionLinkBuilder

        protected org.springframework.hateoas.LinkBuilder getCollectionLinkBuilder()
        Build up a URI for the collection using the Spring MVC controller followed by the resource type transformed by the RelProvider. Assumption is that an EmployeeController serving up an Employee objects will be serving resources at /employees and /employees/1. If this is not the case, simply override this method in your concrete instance, or simply resort to overriding addLinks(Resource) and addLinks(Resources) where you have full control over exactly what links are put in the individual and collection resources.
        Returns:
        link builder
